summary.span: 使用 Brotli 数据格式规范提供用于压缩和解压缩流的方法和属性。

span.span: Provides methods and properties used to compress and decompress streams by using the Brotli data format specification.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Threading.Tasks.ValueTask DisposeAsync ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance valuetype System.Threading.Tasks.ValueTask DisposeAsync() cil managed
Public Overrides Function DisposeAsync () As ValueTask
public: override System::Threading::Tasks::ValueTask DisposeAsync();
override this.DisposeAsync : unit -> System.Threading.Tasks.ValueTask

summary.span: 异步释放 使用的非托管资源。

span.span: Asynchronously releases the unmanaged resources used by the .

returns.span: 一个表示异步释放操作的任务。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous dispose operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用 `DisposeAsync` 方法，您可以在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的释放操作。The `DisposeAsync` method lets you perform a resource-intensive dispose operation without blocking the main thread. 在 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用或 [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] 应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让您的应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。This performance consideration is particularly important in a [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] app or [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working. 异步方法与 Visual Basic 和C#中的 `async` 和 `await` 关键字结合使用。The async methods are used in conjunction with the `async` and `await` keywords in Visual Basic and C#. 此方法通过将任何更改写入后备存储并关闭流以释放资源来释放 Brotli 流。This method disposes the Brotli stream by writing any changes to the backing store and closing the stream to release resources. 调用 `DisposeAsync` 允许出于其他目的重新分配 所使用的资源。Calling `DisposeAsync` allows the resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

summary.span: 异步清理这个 Brotli 流的所有缓冲区，并使所有缓冲数据写入基础设备，并且监控取消请求。

span.span: Asynchronously clears all buffers for this Brotli stream, causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device, and monitors cancellation requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在操作完成前取消该操作，则返回的任务将包含 属性的 值。If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the value for the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int Read (Span<byte> buffer);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 Read(valuetype System.Span`1<unsigned int8> buffer) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Read (buffer As Span(Of Byte)) As Integer
public: override int Read(Span<System::Byte> buffer);
override this.Read : Span<byte> -> int

param.name: buffer
param.span: 内存的区域。

span.span: A region of memory.

param.span: 当此方法返回时，此区域的内容将替换为从当前源读取的字节。

span.span: When this method returns, the contents of this region are replaced by the bytes read from the current source.

summary.span: 将当前 Brotli 流中的一个字节序列读取到字节范围，并按读取的字节数向前移动 Brotli 流中的位置。

span.span: Reads a sequence of bytes from the current Brotli stream to a byte span and advances the position within the Brotli stream by the number of bytes read.

returns.span: 读入缓冲区中的总字节数。

span.span: The total number of bytes read into the buffer.

returns.span: 如果很多字节当前不可用，则这可小于在缓冲区中分配的字节数；如果已到达流结尾，则为零 (0)。

span.span: This can be less than the number of bytes allocated in the buffer if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero (0) if the end of the stream has been reached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定当前实例是否支持读取。Use the property to determine whether the current instance supports reading. 使用 方法从当前流中异步读取。Use the method to read asynchronously from the current stream. 此方法从当前流中读取最多 `buffer.Length` 个字节，并将它们存储在 `buffer`中。This method read a maximum of `buffer.Length` bytes from the current stream and store them in `buffer`. Brotli 流中的当前位置由读取的字节数提前，但是，如果发生异常，则 Brotli 流中的当前位置将保持不变。The current position within the Brotli stream is advanced by the number of bytes read; however, if an exception occurs, the current position within the Brotli stream remains unchanged. 如果没有数据可用，则此方法将被阻止，直到至少有一个字节的数据可供读取。This method will block until at least one byte of data can be read, in the event that no data is available. 仅当流中没有更多的数据，并且不需要更多的数据时（例如闭合套接字或文件尾），`Read` 才返回0。`Read` returns 0 only when there is no more data in the stream and no more is expected (such as a closed socket or end of file). 即使尚未到达流的末尾，方法也可以随意返回比所请求的字节更少的字节。The method is free to return fewer bytes than requested even if the end of the stream has not been reached. 使用 读取基元数据类型。Use for reading primitive data types.

param.name: buffer

span.span: The region of memory to write the data into.

param.span: 要监视的取消请求标记。

span.span: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

param.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

summary.span: 从当前 Brotli 流异步读取字节的序列，将其写入字节内存范围，按读取的字节数向前移动 Brotli 流中的位置，并监视取消请求。

span.span: Asynchronously reads a sequence of bytes from the current Brotli stream, writes them to a byte memory range, advances the position within the Brotli stream by the number of bytes read, and monitors cancellation requests.

returns.span: 一个表示异步读取操作并将读取的总字节数包装到缓冲区中的任务。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous read operation, which wraps the total number of bytes read into the buffer.

returns.span: 如果很多字节当前不可用，则结果值可小于在缓冲区中分配的字节数；如果已到达 Brotli 流结尾，则结果值可以为 0（零）。

span.span: The result value can be less than the number of bytes allocated in the buffer if that many bytes are not currently available, or it can be 0 (zero) if the end of the Brotli stream has been reached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用 `ReadAsync` 方法，你可以在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的 i/o 操作。The `ReadAsync` method enables you to perform resource-intensive I/O operations without blocking the main thread. 在 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用或 [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] 应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让您的应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。This performance consideration is particularly important in a [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] app or [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working. 异步方法与 Visual Basic 和C#中的 `async` 和 `await` 关键字结合使用。The async methods are used in conjunction with the `async` and `await` keywords in Visual Basic and C#. 使用 属性可确定当前实例是否支持读取。Use the property to determine whether the current instance supports reading. 如果在操作完成前取消该操作，则返回的任务将包含 属性的 值。If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the value for the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Threading.Tasks.Task<int> ReadAsync (byte[] buffer, int offset, int count, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<int32> ReadAsync(unsigned int8[] buffer, int32 offset, int32 count, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
public: override System::Threading::Tasks::Task<int> ^ ReadAsync(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer, int offset, int count, System::Threading::CancellationToken cancellationToken);
override this.ReadAsync : byte[] * int * int * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task<int>

param.name: buffer
param.span: 数据写入的缓冲区。

span.span: The buffer to write the data into.

param.name: offset
param.span: 中的字节偏移量，从该偏移量开始写入从 Brotli 流中读取的数据。

span.span: The byte offset in at which to begin writing data from the Brotli stream.

param.name: count
param.span: 要读取的最大字节数。

span.span: The maximum number of bytes to read.

param.name: cancellationToken
param.span: 要监视的取消请求标记。

span.span: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

param.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

summary.span: 读取当前 Brotli 流中的一个字节序列，将其写入从指定索引处开始的字节数组，按读取的字节数向前移动 Brotli 流中的位置，并监视取消请求。

span.span: Asynchronously reads a sequence of bytes from the current Brotli stream, writes them to a byte array starting at a specified index, advances the position within the Brotli stream by the number of bytes read, and monitors cancellation requests.

returns.span: 一个表示异步读取操作（将读取的总字节数包装到 中）的任务。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous read operation, which wraps the total number of bytes read into the .

returns.span: 如果当前可用字节数少于所请求的字节数，则该结果值可小于所请求的字节数；如果已到达 Brotli 流结尾时，则为 0（零）。

span.span: The result value can be less than the number of bytes requested if the number of bytes currently available is less than the requested number, or it can be 0 (zero) if the end of the Brotli stream has been reached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用 `ReadAsync` 方法，你可以在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的 i/o 操作。The `ReadAsync` method enables you to perform resource-intensive I/O operations without blocking the main thread. 在 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用或 [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] 应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让您的应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。This performance consideration is particularly important in a [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] app or [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working. 异步方法与 Visual Basic 和C#中的 `async` 和 `await` 关键字结合使用。The async methods are used in conjunction with the `async` and `await` keywords in Visual Basic and C#. 使用 属性可确定当前实例是否支持读取。Use the property to determine whether the current instance supports reading. 如果在操作完成前取消该操作，则返回的任务将包含 属性的 值。If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the value for the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Write (ReadOnlySpan<byte> buffer);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Write(valuetype System.ReadOnlySpan`1<unsigned int8> buffer) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Write (buffer As ReadOnlySpan(Of Byte))
public: override void Write(ReadOnlySpan<System::Byte> buffer);
override this.Write : ReadOnlySpan<byte> -> unit

param.name: buffer
param.span: 内存的区域。

span.span: A region of memory.

param.span: 此方法将此区域的内容复制到当前 Brotli 流。

span.span: This method copies the contents of this region to the current Brotli stream.

summary.span: 将一个字节序列从只读字节范围写入当前 Brotli 缓冲流，并按写入的字节数向前移动此 Brotli 流中的当前位置。

span.span: Writes a sequence of bytes to the current Brotli stream from a read-only byte span and advances the current position within this Brotli stream by the number of bytes written.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定当前实例是否支持写入。Use the property to determine whether the current instance supports writing. 使用 方法异步写入当前流。Use the method to write asynchronously to the current stream. 如果写入操作成功，Brotli 流中的位置将按写入的字节数向前移动。If the write operation is successful, the position within the Brotli stream advances by the number of bytes written. 如果发生异常，则 Brotli 流中的位置将保持不变。If an exception occurs, the position within the Brotli stream remains unchanged.

param.span: 包含要压缩的数据的缓冲区。

span.span: The buffer containing the data to compress.

param.name: offset
param.span: 中的字节偏移量，将在此处读取字节。

span.span: The byte offset in from which the bytes will be read.

param.name: count
param.span: 要写入的最大字节数。

span.span: The maximum number of bytes to write.

summary.span: 从指定的字节数组中将压缩的字节写入基础流。

span.span: Writes compressed bytes to the underlying stream from the specified byte array.

exception.span: 由于流已关闭，因此无法执行写入操作。

span.span: The write operation cannot be performed because the stream is closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用 `WriteAsync` 方法，你可以在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的 i/o 操作。The `WriteAsync` method enables you to perform resource-intensive I/O operations without blocking the main thread. 在 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用或 [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] 应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让您的应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。This performance consideration is particularly important in a [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] app or [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working. 异步方法与 Visual Basic 和C#中的 `async` 和 `await` 关键字结合使用。The async methods are used in conjunction with the `async` and `await` keywords in Visual Basic and C#. 使用 属性可确定当前实例是否支持写入。Use the property to determine whether the current instance supports writing. 如果在操作完成前取消该操作，则返回的任务将包含 属性的 值。If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the value for the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用 `WriteAsync` 方法，你可以在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的 i/o 操作。The `WriteAsync` method enables you to perform resource-intensive I/O operations without blocking the main thread. 在 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用或 [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] 应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让您的应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。This performance consideration is particularly important in a [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] app or [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working. 异步方法与 Visual Basic 和C#中的 `async` 和 `await` 关键字结合使用。The async methods are used in conjunction with the `async` and `await` keywords in Visual Basic and C#. 使用 属性可确定当前实例是否支持写入。Use the property to determine whether the current instance supports writing. 如果在操作完成前取消该操作，则返回的任务将包含 属性的 值。If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the value for the property.
